title: "Troubleshoot Apache Oozie in Azure HDInsight"
excerpt: "With the Apache Oozie UI, you can view Oozie logs. The Oozie UI also contains links to the JobTracker logs for the MapReduce tasks that were started by the workflow. The pattern for troubleshooting should be: View the job in Oozie web UI."
